# Pull Request Checklist

## Summary
- What does this change do?
- Why is it needed?

## Validation
- [ ] `npm run lint` passes
- [ ] `npm run build` succeeds
- [ ] Manually tested in browser (`npm run dev`)
- [ ] Manually tested in Electron (`npm run electron:dev`) if applicable

## Risk / Rollback
- [ ] Low risk or documented risks
- [ ] Rollback plan (if applicable)
